data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, yɛde yɛn aso ate;
Wode wo nsa pamoo amanaman no
Ɛnyɛ wɔn akofena na wɔde nyaa asase no,
Woyɛ me Ɔhene ne me Onyankopɔn,
Ɛnam wo so na yɛpamoo yɛn Atamfoɔ;
Meremfa me ho nto mʼagyan so
na wo na woma yɛdi yɛn atamfoɔ so.
Onyankopɔn mu na yɛhoahoa yɛn ho da mu nyinaa
Nanso seesei woapo yɛn abrɛ yɛn ase;
Woma yɛdwane firii ɛdɔm anim
Woyii yɛn maa sɛ wɔnkum yɛn sɛ nnwan
Wotɔn wo nkurɔfoɔ fofoofo,
Woayɛ yɛn ahohoradeɛ ama yɛn afipamfoɔ,
Woayɛ yɛn akasabɛbuo wɔ aman no mu
Mʼanimguaseɛ di mʼanim daa,
ɛsiane wɔn a wɔbɔ me ahohora na wɔkasa tia me de yi me ahi,
Yeinom nyinaa too yɛn deɛ,
Yɛn akoma ntwe mfirii wo ho;
Nanso wodwerɛɛ yɛn yɛɛ yɛn sakraman tuo
Sɛ na yɛn werɛ afiri yɛn Onyankopɔn din
anka Onyankopɔn bɛhunu,
Nanso, wo enti, wɔkum yɛn daa nyinaa;
Nyane, Ao Awurade! Adɛn enti na wada?
Adɛn enti na wode wʼanim ahinta
Wɔabrɛ yɛn ase kɔ dɔteɛ mu
Sɔre bɛboa yɛn;
